ActTrust and Loan Companies Act
PrecisFOREIGN INSTITUTIONS SUBJECT TO THE CANADIAN RESIDENCY REQUIREMENTS REGULATIONS (TRUST AND LOAN COMPANIES) which set out the conditions under which a holding body corporate of a foreign institution would be prescribed for the purposes of subsection 163(2) of the Trust and Loan Companies Act.
